Name: Get-HgsTrace
Synopsis: Collects and analyzes data relevant to the operation of a guarded fabric.

Name: Get-HgsTraceFileData
Synopsis: Gets metadata about and the contents of HGS Diagnostic trace files recorded in a trace manifest.

Name: New-HgsTraceTarget
Synopsis: Creates a HGS Diagnostics target object.

Name: Test-HgsTraceTarget
Synopsis: Verifies that a remote Windows PowerShell® session can be opened to the provided target.
